A

AI - Class in games.chess
This is where you build your AI for the Chess game.
AI() - Constructor for class games.chess.AI
 

C

captured - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The Piece captured by this Move, null if no capture.
captured - Variable in class games.chess.Piece
When the Piece has been captured (removed from the board) this is true.
clientType - Variable in class games.chess.Player
What type of client this is, e.g.
color - Variable in class games.chess.Player
The color (side) of this player.
currentPlayer - Variable in class games.chess.Game
The player whose turn it is currently.
currentTurn - Variable in class games.chess.Game
The current turn number, starting at 0 for the first player's turn.

E

ended(boolean, String) - Method in class games.chess.AI
This is automatically called when the game ends.

F

fen - Variable in class games.chess.Game
Forsythâ€“Edwards Notation, a notation that describes the game board.
file - Variable in class games.chess.Piece
The file (column) coordinate of the Piece represented as a letter [a-h], with 'a' starting at the left of the board.
fromFile - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The file the Piece moved from.
fromRank - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The rank the Piece moved from.

G

game - Variable in class games.chess.AI
This is the Game object itself, it contains all the information about the current game
Game - Class in games.chess
The traditional 8x8 chess board with pieces.
GameObject - Class in games.chess
An object in the game.
gameObjectName - Variable in class games.chess.GameObject
String representing the top level Class that this game object is an instance of.
games.chess - package games.chess
Chess Java Client
gameUpdated() - Method in class games.chess.AI
This is automatically called every time the game (or anything in it) updates.
getName() - Method in class games.chess.AI
This returns your AI's name to the game server.
getSetting(String) - Method in class games.chess.AI
Gets an AI setting passed to the program via the `--aiSettings` flag.

H

hasMoved - Variable in class games.chess.Piece
If the Piece has moved from its starting position.

I

inCheck - Variable in class games.chess.Player
True if this player is currently in check, and must move out of check, false otherwise.

L

log(String) - Method in class games.chess.GameObject
Adds a message to this GameObject's logs.
logs - Variable in class games.chess.GameObject
Any strings logged will be stored here.
lost - Variable in class games.chess.Player
If the player lost the game or not.

M

madeMove - Variable in class games.chess.Player
If the Player has made their move for the turn.
maxTurns - Variable in class games.chess.Game
The maximum number of turns before the game will automatically end.
Move - Class in games.chess
Contains all details about a Piece's move in the game.
move(String, int) - Method in class games.chess.Piece
Defaults the value for the optional arg 'promotionType' to '""'
move(String, int, String) - Method in class games.chess.Piece
Moves the Piece from its current location to the given rank and file.
moves - Variable in class games.chess.Game
The list of Moves that have occurred, in order.

N

name - Variable in class games.chess.Player
The name of the player.

O

opponent - Variable in class games.chess.Player
This player's opponent in the game.
owner - Variable in class games.chess.Piece
The player that controls this chess Piece.

P

piece - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The Piece that was moved.
Piece - Class in games.chess
A chess piece.
pieces - Variable in class games.chess.Game
All the uncaptured Pieces in the game.
pieces - Variable in class games.chess.Player
All the uncaptured chess Pieces owned by this player.
player - Variable in class games.chess.AI
This is your AI's player.
Player - Class in games.chess
A player in this game.
players - Variable in class games.chess.Game
List of all the players in the game.
promotion - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The Piece type this Move's Piece was promoted to from a Pawn, empty string if no promotion occurred.

R

rank - Variable in class games.chess.Piece
The rank (row) coordinate of the Piece represented as a number [1-8], with 1 starting at the bottom of the board.
rankDirection - Variable in class games.chess.Player
The direction your Pieces must go along the rank axis until they reach the other side.
reasonLost - Variable in class games.chess.Player
The reason why the player lost the game.
reasonWon - Variable in class games.chess.Player
The reason why the player won the game.
runTurn() - Method in class games.chess.AI
This is called every time it is this AI.player's turn.

S

san - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The standard algebraic notation (SAN) representation of the move.
session - Variable in class games.chess.Game
A unique identifier for the game instance that is being played.
start() - Method in class games.chess.AI
This is automatically called when the game first starts, once the Game object and all GameObjects have been initialized, but before any players do anything.

T

timeRemaining - Variable in class games.chess.Player
The amount of time (in ns) remaining for this AI to send commands.
toFile - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The file the Piece moved to.
toRank - Variable in class games.chess.Move
The rank the Piece moved to.
turnsToDraw - Variable in class games.chess.Game
How many turns until the game ends because no pawn has moved and no Piece has been taken.
type - Variable in class games.chess.Piece
The type of chess Piece this is, either: 'King', 'Queen', 'Knight', 'Rook', 'Bishop', or 'Pawn'.

W

won - Variable in class games.chess.Player
If the player won the game or not.
